RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 1 7F Dirt CR: 71. Maiden Special Weight Purse 34000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Preference To Horses That Have Not Started For Less $20,000).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: Z'S GUITAR void of early foot after being last away, continued to lag well back into the turn, came four wide for the drive, closed with good resolve to be up in time. GOT ME A CHRYSLER forwardly placed, vied three wide midway on the turn, dueled into the lane in the two path, shook clear past the furlong marker, could not contain the winner, clearly second best. HEZA SEXY ZONG moved up along the inside to challenge before a quarter, dueled inside the runner up into the lane, gradually weakened to prove no match for the top two, saved the show. HAWAIIAN ARGUMENT in mid pack while racing outside, was four wide midway on the turn, went evenly through the lane. PARTY LITTLE BOY broke well, raced within striking distance early, second flight in the turn, had little for the drive. BLEEP BLEEP bobbled and broke out, was righted soon after, showed the way out of the chute, allowed a rival up inside before a quarter, vied into the turn, stopped late in the bend, jogged in. UNCLE HUTCH finished early, also was well back at the end, jogged in.

ENTRY.NAME: Z's Guitar
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of early foot, continued to lag, 4w into lane, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Heza Sexy Zong
ENTRY.COMMENT: early bid inside, dueled into lane, weakened, saved show

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Hutch
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, well back, jogged in

ENTRY.NAME: Party Little Boy
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke well, within striking distance, little for drive

ENTRY.NAME: Got Me a Chrysler
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, dueled into lane, shook clear, caught late

ENTRY.NAME: Hawaiian Argument
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack outside, 4w mid turn, evenly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Bleep Bleep
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled, broke out, early pace 2p, stopped

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 86. Claiming Purse 12000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON TWO RACES SINCE NOVEMBER 18, 2022. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 18, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000 (Claiming Races For $4,000 Or Less Not Consider ed In Weight And Eligibility).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IN THE ARCH in the second flight up the backstretch well off the inside, three wide into the turn, challenged on the outside entering the stretch, briskly roused with a right handed crop to draw clear soon after, continued to steadily increase that advantage under continued right handed pressure. SMOOTH COLLIERY back off the pace while inside the winner and between horses, shifted out a bit late in the turn, finished willingly to be well clear of the others, no threat to the winner. BUNKIE'S SONG dueled up front in the two path, finished up best of the rest. CRUSADER EXPRESS within striking distance early along the inside, fell back while continuing to save ground turn, came in the two path for the drive, went evenly to the wire in lacking a closing kick. HOME BASE alternated up front closest to the inside, faltered in the drive. CLEAR HUMOR last away, trailed throughout in showing little.

ENTRY.NAME: Crusader Express
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance early, fell back inside, even drive

ENTRY.NAME: Smooth Colliery
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace btwn foes, shifted out late turn, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Home Base
ENTRY.OWNER: Wiest Rick Wiest Clayton Wiest Lana and Kropp Gary
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled inside, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: In the Arch
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight off rail, 3w turn, outside bid into lane, drew off

ENTRY.NAME: Clear Humor
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, showed little

ENTRY.NAME: Bunkie's Song
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2p, finished best of rest

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 3 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 37000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 18, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FINAL QUEST broke out but was prominent from the start while off the inside, three wide bid while between foes late in the turn, kicked well clear the final furlong under steady handling. GATOR PROUD back off the pace and the rail, ranged up to challenge four wide and outside the winner turning for home, proved no match for the winner, held sway for the place. SWEET VIDALIA closest to the early leader just off the inside, moved to challenge outside that one and inside the winner by midway on the bend, chased the winner past the furlong marker, outkicked late for the place. STORM BREACH last to leave, continued to trail in the run up the backstretch, picked off a couple of tiring rivals after the issue had been decided. BLUE RIDGE QUEEN broke alertly, soon sprinted clear to show the way up the backstretch along the inside, vied through the turn while remaining closest to the inside, faltered entering the stretch. BEYOND D'ORO in the second flight early, began to back up after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Blue Ridge Queen
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, sprinted clear, pace factor for a half, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Vidalia
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased early,bid btwn foes, led late turn, outkicked 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Gator Proud
ENTRY.COMMENT: back off the pace, 4w bid into lane,no match

ENTRY.NAME: Storm Breach
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, trailed, passed tiring rivals

ENTRY.NAME: Beyond d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2nd flight early, backed up

ENTRY.NAME: Final Quest
ENTRY.COMMENT: prominent from start, 3w bid btwn foes turn, kicked clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 4 7 1/2F Turf CR: 57. Maiden Claiming Purse 18000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $20,000, For Each $2,500 To $15,000 2 lbs. (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ROSIE'S ANGUS with the pace from the start, dueled up the backstretch and into the far turn, asked along midway on that bend, showed the way into the lane. TAP IRON FIST pushed in and lightly bumped at the break, lacked speed, began to advance second turn, waited briefly approaching the furlong grounds split foes, finished willingly to be clear for the place. CALIFORNIA BELLE broke in to bother a couple of inner rivals, behind the pace well out in the course first turn, continued outside, four wide through the second bend, made a bid for the runner up position past the furlong marker, not enough for that spot, edged clear of the others. BLACK ACE within striking distance early, continued to race within contention, chased the winner upper stretch, flattened out to lose a couple of positions the final furslong. SWEETASBAILY fell well back to trail the opening quarter, continued well back the middle half mile, improved position through the straight with some belated interest, no real threat. HOT GOLDEN GIRL broke out top, narrowly set the pace, began to gradually weakened when headed by the winner in the second turn. SANGIOVESE pushed in at the start to lightly bump with the runner up, settled in mid pack, had little for the drive. PERIPHERAL VISION was finished early, well back. BATTLE OF WITS was always outrun.

ENTRY.NAME: Peripheral Vision
ENTRY.COMMENT: finished early, well back

ENTRY.NAME: Hot Golden Girl
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke on top, pace, weakened when headed

ENTRY.NAME: Black Ace
ENTRY.COMMENT: within striking distance, chased upper, flattenred

ENTRY.NAME: Tap Iron Fist
ENTRY.COMMENT: pushed in break, lacked speed, brief wait, split foes, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Sangiovese
ENTRY.COMMENT: pushed in break, settled in mid pack, had little for the drive

ENTRY.NAME: California Belle
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in, 2nd flight outside, 4w 2nd turn, not enough for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Battle of Wits
ENTRY.COMMENT: was always outrun

ENTRY.NAME: Rosie's Angus
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace from start, dueled 2p, asked 2nd turn, drew clear

ENTRY.NAME: Sweetasbaily
ENTRY.COMMENT: fell far back, improved position, no real threat

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 5 5F Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 13000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500. Louisiana Bred Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GEAUX SUGAR pushed in at the break to bump MOURVEDRE, was straightened, took over into the turn off the inside, shook clear when straightened for home, enough left to hold off the runner up late. MOURVEDRE in tight at bumped at the break, lacked speed, came five wide for the drive, set down, late surge to finish willingly while too late. KIT KAT KIDD settled in the second flight early in the two path, steered out into lane, along for the show, not a serious threat to the top two. CUSTOM PRAYER broke in, was straightened to race within striking distance, lacked the needed closing response. A'DEBRIS pressed the issue from the three path, had little for the drive. D T'S DREAM lacked speed, came four wide and inside the winner exiting the turn, failed to muster a rally.

ENTRY.NAME: D T's Dream
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 4w into lane, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Kit Kat Kidd
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled in mid pack, 2p turn, along for show late

ENTRY.NAME: Mourvedre
ENTRY.COMMENT: tight, bumped brk, back, 5w into lane, willingly, too late

ENTRY.NAME: Geaux Sugar
ENTRY.OWNER: Hernandez Earl J Hernandez Keith J and Duvieilh John
ENTRY.COMMENT: pushed in brk, took over into turn, clear, held late

ENTRY.NAME: Custom Prayer
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in, within striking distance,lacked needed bid

ENTRY.NAME: A'debris
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 3w, little left

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 57. Maiden Claiming Purse 16000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $10,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OURPERFECTPRINCE with the pace from the start along the inside, asked along to keep position along the rail turn, put a head in front when straightened for home, long drive, found more late to prevail in game fashion. BEAUDEAN with the pace outside, held a narrow advantage three wide late in the turn, continued to battle past the furlong marker and held on stubbornly to the end. SAUCY ARGUMENT off the early pace out in the strip, moved closer in the four path turn, vied past the furlong marker while widest of the first flight, not enough for the top two late. MIDNIGHT CROWN behind the leaders, continued to race behind a wall of horses late in the turn, clear while between foes for the drive, came up empty. BOSS MAN ZONG lacked early foot outside, came five wide out of the turn, lacked the needed closing response as well. TENSAS ALL OURS last to leave, raced back, also lacked a bid. MIDGE'S TIME vied up front while between rivals for a half and gave way.

ENTRY.NAME: Tensas All Ours
ENTRY.COMMENT: last to leave, back, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Ourperfectprince
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace inside, asked along turn, long drive, found more late

ENTRY.NAME: Midnight Crown
ENTRY.COMMENT: behind leaders, continued in traffic turn, empty when clear

ENTRY.NAME: Midge's Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied up front between rivals, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Beaudean
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace outside, 3w turn, stubbornly drive

ENTRY.NAME: Saucy Argument
ENTRY.COMMENT: off early pace, closer 4w turn, vied stretch, not enough

ENTRY.NAME: Boss Man Zong
ENTRY.COMMENT: void of speed, 5w into the stretch, lacked needed bid

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 7 1M Turf CR: 83. Allowance Purse 35000. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER ON THE TURF. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 18, 2023 A llowed 3 lbs. A Race Since March 18, 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. (Claiming Races Not Considered In Allowances). (Rail at 20 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MONEY WELL SPENT mid pack inside, continued to track the leaders under patient handling while saving some ground second turn, shifted out in upper straight, asked, full of run late to win going away. SIXTH ANNIVERSARY forwardly placed while off the inside, continued close while three wide far turn, challenged three wide into the stretch, proved no match for the winner, game for the place. MISS JANA last away, void of speed, moved inside, slipped through along the rail turning for home, improved position. LUTIE MO lacked speed, four wide into the far turn, three wide into the lane, also bettered position while too late. BE A BANDIT dueled up front off the inside, continued to hold a narrow advantage in the two path through the final turn and into the lane, faltered final furlong. JERSEY HOTTIE broke alertly, set or forced the pace along the inside, also weakened in the late going. ANGELA'S CELERITY in mid pack while off the inside, continued in the main body second turn, failed to respond in the drive. MY LITTLE JEN shuffled back at the start, moved out, four wide first turn, remained back. GEORGIA DAWN stopped after a half, fell well back, jogged in.

ENTRY.NAME: Lutie Mo
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, 4w 2nd turn, bettered position

ENTRY.NAME: Jersey Hottie
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke alertly, set or forced pace inside, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Be a Bandit
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled up front led, faltered late

ENTRY.NAME: My Little Jen
ENTRY.OWNER: Sharp Cynthia A and Richards Corale A
ENTRY.COMMENT: shuffled back after start, 4w 1st turn, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Money Well Spent
ENTRY.COMMENT: patient inside, shifted out, asked, full of run late, going away

ENTRY.NAME: Georgia Dawn
ENTRY.COMMENT: stopped after half, far back, jogged in

ENTRY.NAME: Angela's Celerity
ENTRY.COMMENT: mid pack off the inside, lacked response

ENTRY.NAME: Sixth Anniversary
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, 3w bid into lane, no match, game 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Miss Jana
ENTRY.OWNER: Arnaud Thomas L and Cassedy Allen
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away,lacked speed, slipped thru rail, improved

RACE.RACE_TEXT: EVANGELINE DOWNS RACE 8 7F Dirt CR: 73. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR ACCREDITED LA BRED THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 18, 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Claiming Price $5,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STEAL IT BACK last out of the chute, moved closer while saving ground through the turn, in traffic, split foes late to challenge, proved narrowly best in a gutty effort. CUSTOMIZE MY QUEST forwardly placed well out in the strip up the backstretch while between horses, four wide into the turn, three wide exiting, lost some ground to the leader, battled back to challenge late while widest of the first flight, missed. FLIT N FLOT TIME with the pace while three wide and also between foes, battled into the lane, continued to equal terms with the leader past the furlong marker, gave ground grudgingly to the top two while between that pair late. BIG BOSS MAN with the pace along the inside, held a narrow advantage into the lane and past the furlong marker, weakened late. MY BOOK with the first flight while widest, five wide into the turn, four wide exiting, tired through the lane. CAEUS IN PASADENA lacked speed, swung out to be five wide and widest into the lane, improved slightly while not a threat. TOO MUCH CROWN last away, remained back in failing to threat. SOURNOIS set or forced the pace while between foes for five furlongs, gave way. COUNTERFEIT vied early while four wide and between foes, began a steady fade before a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Big Boss Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace inside, narrow lead stretch, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Steal It Back
ENTRY.COMMENT: last out of chute, closer turn inside, split foes late, gutty

ENTRY.NAME: Caeus in Pasadena
ENTRY.COMMENT: lacked speed, swung out 5w into lane, improved bit

ENTRY.NAME: Sournois
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied between foes, gave way

ENTRY.NAME: Too Much Crown
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away, remained back

ENTRY.NAME: Flit N Flot Time
ENTRY.COMMENT: with pace 3w, vied into lane, grudgingly

ENTRY.NAME: Counterfeit
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied early 4w, steady retreat

ENTRY.NAME: Customize My Quest
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed, 4-3w turn, late bid, outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: My Book
ENTRY.COMMENT: with first flight, 5w into turn, 4w exiting, tired
